etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یگنی (yeğni), from Old Anatolian Turkish یینی (yeyni), یكنی (yegni), یكول (yeŋül), from Proto-Turkic *yeŋil.
cognates
Cognate with Turkmen yeňil, Crimean Tatar and Uzbek yengil, Uyghur يەڭگىل (yenggil), Bashkir еңел (yeñel), Tatar җиңел (ciñel), Kazakh жеңіл (jeñıl), Kyrgyz жеңил (jeŋil), Gagauz ilin.
